Articles.Content:
in the same theme as Trbinsc\'s challenge

the first round trip moon mission of .14 has run out of fuel before the return burn out of Munar orbit, leaving two reluctant kerbalnauts (and one enthusiastic one) trapped in orbit around the Mun. as kerbals currently don\'t need air or food you have time, but the secondary objective may be time sensitive (depending on how the save has screwed with the vector).

Primary Objective: bring the crew (and company owner) back to kerball

Secondary objectives: if possible, retrieve the secondary stage

you may take control of the stranded return stage if it helps, it\'s only got a hair of fuel left but it\'s still got a load of RCS fuel. you may also decouple the CM if your recovery ship can\'t handle the whole stage.

the save file has put the second stage trailing behind the Mun, i watched it for a time while i was testing my own recovery vehicles and it returns to the planet after awhile, where it presumably re-enters and crashes.

it\'s a stock ship, do i need to include the .craft file or anything else?

edit: to elaborate here\'s some screenshots

the stranded return stage and it\'s orbit around the Mun
i meant the stage still attached to the CM
